CodeplexIssue.Title: Resize doesn't resize range
CodeplexIssue.DescriptionHtml:
In VBA when doing resize on a range it will resize the range. But when I do it with NetOffice it returns the index of the range. E.g.,
rng=Range("A2:C14") rng2=rng.Resize(rng.Rows.Count, 1)
Now rng2 should be:
"A2:A14"
But instead it is:
"A14"
Likewise, if I do this:
rng2=rng.Resize(Type.Missing, 1)
Should return:
"A2:A14"
But instead returns:
"A2"
